title: Divinations
data:
{{obsolete}}

'''Divinations''' was the skill which governed the casting of Divinations spells. Improving this skill increased the [[spell power]] of these spells as a well as the chance of casting them successfully.

Divinations focused on knowledge and detection. Many spells like [[Detect Curse]] and [[Magic Mapping]] were replicated from [[scroll]] effects. [[Ashenzari]], the god of Divinations (introduced after this school's removal), filled in the other gaps.

For a long time, while the Divinations school was unavailable to players, its [[miscast effect]]s were used for a few aspects of the game.

==See Also==
*[[:Category:Divination|List of Divinations spells]]

==History==
*Divinations miscast effects were removed in [[0.20]].
*Several Divinations spells were still available through the use of a [[rod of discovery]] until that was removed in [[0.8]].
*The Divinations spell school was removed in [[0.6]].
